logical_fallacies.correction: The statement attacks a group (Mongolians) rather than addressing any specific argument or claim. Even if the content is considered 'shitposting,' the origin or association with a particular group is irrelevant to the validity of the content itself. A more logical approach would be to evaluate the content on its own merits, regardless of its origin.

localization.suggested_vibe: Generic internet slang with possible reference to Mongolian culture.
